episodes.title: Cults! CULTS! Cults?
episodes.description:
James and Rion have experience with cult-like thinking and how organizations use it to keep people dependent.
Join them every Wednesday as they discuss the headlines that relate to high control groups and extreme beliefs. 
☕️https://www.pbs.org/newshour/education/a-look-at-the-protests-of-the-war-in-gaza-that-have-emerged-at-us-colleges
